message.body: My paper is 9 hours late, and still I refuse to write it
Just doooo it!
I need self control
It can be yours! Free! Now!
I suck at time management!
Meeeee too. I'm watching Adam Curtis documentaries instead. I hate esem so much I've cracked!
I did NOT get a ton done this weekend
Lol me neither. 2 things, working on 3
I would work on this paper, but there is a cat on my chest

Lol take the cat off, put your phone in the other room, turn the vibrate and sound functions off and just slap down some bullshit off the top of your head. You can fix it up later and it will still be better than EVERONE else's in your class and you'll fe
You are so wise. I'm going to let this fucker purr for another ten minutes, and then it's on!
How's productivity?
Lol
Medium
Where u at?
I think I used it all up last week. You?
Collections until five
Ouch
That's right
Holla when done!
Eat after?
Yes!!!
FB keeps suggesting I add EVERONE I've slept with as "close friends". How does the Facebook know what I'm up to?! (I did not capitalize everyone intentionally...but left it like that for effect.)
Haha, it was effective. It made it seem like millions of people
EEEEEVVVVEEEEERYYYYYOOOOOONNNNEEEEE
I successfully put my phone down for like twenty minutes
Good work! See? You can do it! And again too!
I just had to play scramble with friends real quick and now back to work!
We are so amazing
It's true. We're brilliant, cool and gorgeous to top it off. Oh, did I also mention how hilarious we are as well? Because: that. Too. Very.
Haha actually I'm just sleepy. I'm going to get an amazing nights sleep and rise to tackle my many goals! I crossed SO many things off my Saturday to-do list. It felt great!
Yes! We are pretty much the total package. Rest up, tomorrow you are going to kill it!
I'm going to quote the wall of Thebes in my Gilgamesh paper
Do it!!!
Want to sign up to proctor together so we can have forced study time?
Sure!
I just slept for the past 15 hrs
That's amazing! Yeah I woke up early, returning a reserve book late
I mean I woke up late
Ha
It felt wonderful. Soooo hard to get up though. Whatever, my life is NOT hard. Where do we sign up for proctoring?
We sign up on line I want to do Wednesday morning at 9, so I am forced to be here early
All I want to do is lie on the couch and study. After this delicious campus center chili/soup combination
￼Mini nebulizer....not the kind of vaporizer I was hoping to get my lips on
Are you having respiratory issues?
Yep :(
Getting chest X-rays tomorrow! I'm really excited to see what my rib age looks like!!!
Make a tshirt of it! Same thing from last week?
Yea pretty much
Aw, I'm sorry honey, let me know if you need anything tomorrow
Thanks! I'll be ok. It's a little better this time!
￼Phashun!
Noooo! You should be drinking hot chocolate here with me.
I know :( instead: sleep all day
I wish I weren't so tuckered!
How you feeling little lamb
Still sleepin. Baa
I'm just taking pictures of text instead of writing
Lol!!
Is it helpful or a diversion?
I'm just sleeping instead of doing anything
We go by a 4.0 scale?
You have an excuse, you are a sick kid!
Yep. 4.0
Because my professor posted our grades and while the number is right, the percentage is way lower?
Freaking out, can't focus
What do you mean percentage?
I've heard everyone does poorly the first semester :(
In truth I haven't even been looking at my grades
He has the percentage listed next to the number. I got a 3.0 on one of my papers, and he has that listed as a 75%
What if Evan Seymour was right!
If this is accurate I'm getting a C in the class I thought was my fluff class
What was e Seymour right about? I'm prob not doing so hot in my fluff classes either :(
Teaching myself stats killed my math and I've had to miss a lot of practices over the past couple weeks
Which is pretty much most of my grade! Go to practices!
And I have no idea if being sick is an acceptable excuse. My fave E Seymour quote:
Me being unprepared for Bryn Mawr. God damn how are we supposed to float by if our fluff classes fuck us!
"(It's better to) attempt something difficult and do it imperfectly that master something easily done."
So Bryn Mawr is your difficult challenge, learning curve and all. Honors would have been so easy for you
Yea he's the best. I think they were partially playing devils advocate with you.
You do have photos of you in a hospital gown that has to count for something
So wise. So so wise
Right. This is existential
I'm like a baby bird, I need to be held and comforted

And they prob wanted you to stick around as a good example...and maybe a little bit of what they actually said. But you got in...no sense in wasting another year at CCP. You would come up against the Bryn Mawr learning curve either way
Yeah. I just can't believe my grades are even lower than I thought they were
I'm never going to end up dating because my friends have all been so great that the bar is getting way too high
Haha, I know what u mean.
That's ok though, we will take care of each other when we are older, like the golden girls!
Lol!!!!
I'm just eating slices of coppa like a sad kid with a weakness for cured meats
That sounds sad and delicious
As it went on, it became less sad and more delicious
Perfect remedy then!!
Last e semmmmmm!!!
Lol! Yay!
I'm definitely skipping Esem
I have to do my performance..ugh. Need to finish researching, writing and typing archaeology performance by five
Oh man. I have some 5 pm deadlines too
I know!!! Lol I'm going to get at it. See you on the other side of 5! May the force be with you!!!
It's so far away, and yet not
I.5 hours.....
Omg stop I know!!!! Eeeeiiii!!!!!
How u doin?
I have 1 and a half pages out of three. Eeeee
Three being the absolute minimum, so more like four
I just finished the 5 page paper
Now I have to finish my research paper...so close
I'm so happy for you!
You're really close toooo!!!!!
I know...we are getting there
Lol thanks I just had to get deathly ill and skip a million classes hehe
Whatever works!
I know!!! Yay!
We are actually doing it
Thank god that's over
I'm picking up Vietnamese to celebrate
Lol! Are you coming to the McBride thing?
Hahahaha but u finished right?!
No, I'm already home. I had to write that paper while hangin with smella ha
Somehow!!
Yay! Cause ur badass
I have a q 4 u
My lungs hate me. How's your Friday going?
A q? What's going ion with your lungs?
Stop everything, Brian Seymour is playing at Fergies at 6 please come!!
I wish you saw B Seymour in his glory
Was it beautiful?
Yes. Yes it was.
So so very beautiful.
What are you doing tonight?
Ooo I saw Jay last night too!
